Skill.label: LEVELING LINKS ARE IN THE NOTES SECTION!
Second Wind for Flame Dash + unlinked Vaal Disc

Skill.source: Item:32:Mark of the Shaper, Opal Ring

PathOfBuilding.Notes:
---------- Leveling Gem Links ----------
---- Act 1 ----
-- Starting Links --
- Freezing Pulse + Onslaught (If you're solo, you need to mule it with a Scion) - Stormblast Mine
-- After Mud Flats and Hail Rake --
- Frost Bomb + Onslaught (Stop using Freezing Pulse) - Stormblast Mine + Swift Assembly - Frostblink + Arcane Surge (Keep at level 1) - Orb of Storms (Link with Onslaught too if possible)
-- Lower Prison --
- Stormblast Mine + Swift Assembly + Added Lightning - *Other links are the same*
-- After Brutus Kill --
- Arcane Surge + *Movement Skill* (Use Flame Dash at level 10)
-- After Cavern of Wrath --
- Creeping Frost
---- Act 2 ----
NOTE: Starting in lvl 16 zones, run Vaal Side Areas. Finding a Vaal Cold Snap or Vaal Righteous Fire is a is a huge boost to leveling.
-- After Chamber of Sins --
- Summon Skitterbots, Cold Snap (level in offhand)
-- After killing Weaver --
- Stormblast Mine + Trap and Mine Damage + Added Lightning - Creeping Frost + Elemental Focus + Controlled Destruction - Orb of Storms + Onslaught + Increased Critical Strikes (Buy in Act 1 town) - Cold Snap + Elemental Focus + Controlled Destruction - Skitterbots
---- Act 3 ----
-- After Crematorium --
- Malevolence, Discipline, Frostbite, (level Disc and FBite in offhands for endgame)
-- Buy from Siosa in Library --
- Vortex, 2x Hypothermia, 2x Efficacy, Second Wind
NOTE: Vortex and some important support gems are very Chance Orb intensive, and you may have found as little as 0 Chance Orbs by Act 3. As you accumulate Chance Orbs, purchase gems in this order: Vortex, Hypothermia, Efficacy, Hypothermia, Swift Affliction, Blasphemy
---------- 4L Setups ----------
Once you're lvl 31 and have at least a B-B-B-G and B-B-B-B linked piece of gear, you can go full-on Cold DoT.
GEMS LINKS: - Vortex + Efficacy + Elemental Focus + Hypothermia - (Vaal) Cold Snap + Efficacy + Elemental Focus + Hypothermia - Creeping Frost + Efficacy + Elemental Focus + Controlled Destruction - Malevolence, Skitterbots - Orb of Storms + Onslaught + Increased Critical Strikes (For triggering Elemental Overload on bosses) - Flame Dash + Arcane Surge + Second Wind
GEMS TO LEVEL IN OFF-HANDS/OPEN SLOTS AS AVAILABLE: - Frost Bomb, Tempest Shield, Frostbite, Discipline, Blasphemy, Temportal Chains, Zealotry, Hatred,
---- Act 4 ----
-- After Kaom & Daresso Kills --
- Bonechill, Summon Lightning Golem, Cast When Damage Taken - Swap in Bonechill for Ele Focus in Cold Snap links
NOTE: Immortal Call can only be purchased in Act 6 from Lilly.
Finish campaign and return to the guide for other gem setups.
